attributes.title: Drained my phone!!!
attributes.review: this app took forever to download and really drained my battery life and my cellular data. would not recommend for people that want to save their time and money!

attributes.title: This app is horrible!!!
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. It glitches way to much and it takes forever to download . The app is also very very slow

attributes.title: Terrible!💯
attributes.review: I would give this 0 stars if I good. President Trump advertised this app with many dildo companies leaving me uncomfortable. Also sending me a penis picture of himself. I was left to delete the app after facing harassment🙄

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!
attributes.review: This app makes my phone crash!!! it’s super unreliable and I don’t trust it!! This needs to be taken down!! Absolutely awful! All it has is fake news and I’m worried it’s stealing my data!!!

attributes.title: ALL CANDIDATES MATTER
attributes.review: After seeing and downloading this app, I became very discouraged by the lack of representation of all the candidates in this 2020 election. How is it fair if we put up one candidate on a pedestal and give him more attention than the others? ALL CANDIDATES MATTER not JUST donjay trup😌💅✨

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Actually hard to use and understand I don’t know how to work this app but the one thing I can do is write a review to save the rest of you from this app

attributes.title: almost drown 🐩🐩
attributes.review: Hello! i downloaded this app expecting to get trump 2020 election updates but from downloading this app i almost drowned! i’d rather not get into the details 💖 but i highly don’t recommend this app at all whatsoever ✨ biden 2020 😹

attributes.title: Laggy
attributes.review: This app is very unprofessional. All types of ads have popped up. There was even an “phone cleaning “ ad. I’m glad I was able to exit out in time or I would’ve had an virus

attributes.title: lier
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because it said that if you did then Adam Sandler would show up to ur house and bring you a slushee but it’s been three hours and i’m still waiting on my slushee

attributes.title: This app is terrible delete it
attributes.review: This app is the most disgusting thing I have ever seen why would Apple ever want it it glitches we saw some really scary photos in it  it is the weirdest and grossest app I’ve ever seen 🧚‍♂️ 🧚‍♀️ 💫 ✨
